title: African Dwarf Frog
desc:
Post 3127
Attack - None
Defense - None
- The African Dwarf Frog is an amphibious frog that spends most of its life underwater. It may select a player to submerge, preventing that player from seeing the day chat or doing anything the next day.
Attributes -
- The African Dwarf Frog is unaffected by its ability.
- The African Dwarf Frog has lungs, not gills. After submerging a player, it must rest the next night.
Goal - Keep your habitat from being destroyed and kill those who want to destroy it.
